alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 4:20AM AKST until December 10 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow occurring. Additional accumulation of 1 to 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to a half mile. Strong winds may create higher surf and elevated water levels along the coast. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will be along the coast. Expect gusts up to 45 mph inland, including areas around Bethel. Temperatures will warm into the low to mid 30s later this morning with the threat of blowing snow ending.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
